name: Re-root-ing
description:
After falling into a deep cave system, run, jump, zip, slide and bounce your way through the varied environments of the cave in search of the way out. As you descend from the surface into the depths of the cave, prove your skill against rocks, rapids and lava while racing through six thrilling levels.

Includes in-game tutorial with all controls listed!

Source code available on GitHub.

Made by Carl Bertolino, Dan Battersby, Josh Pattman, Niall Morrison and James Harcourt for Global Game Jam Southampton 2023.

Fan of Re-root-ing? Check out our 2022 jam game, Beans on Chain!
